dtliExcerpt: Midler's Dolly is a force of nature, a whirlwind of comic timing and vocal power that reminds you why this musical has endured for more than half a century.
bwwExcerpt: But the real source of the warmth and color is Midler herself, and the crowd's feelings for her, which together create a feedback loop so tight that the distinction between star and audience is all but obliterated...she performs in a style so broad and unironic despite its myriad references that it ...
